## Sample Vector 
```{r sample data, echo = FALSE}
sample <- c(1.01, -0.15, -0.45, 1.69, -0.23,
            -0.76, -1.10, -0.73,  1.90, -1.70, 
            1.52, -2.13, -1.08, -0.50,  1.11, 
            -0.44, -1.92, -1.50, -1.06,  0.20)
sample
```

## Base R Histogram

```{r}
hist(sample)
```

## ggplot2 Histogram

```{r ggplot2}
df <- as.data.frame(sample)
histogram <- ggplot(data = df, aes(x = df$sample )) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = .25)
histogram
```
